nodes.documentation:
@dev Constructor
     The deploying account becomes contractOwner
     address airlineAddress: first airline to be registered when this contract is first deployed
     string airlineName: Name of the airlines being registered

nodes.name: requireIsOperational

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier that requires the "ContractOwner" account to be the function caller
nodes.name: requireContractOwner

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Caller is not Authorized to access data contract functions"

arguments.value: Caller is not Authorized to access data contract functions

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Caller is not Authorized to access data contract functions"

nodes.name: requireAuthorizedContract
isOperational

nodes.documentation:
@dev Sets contract operations on/off by setting the boolean variable "operational" true or false

    * When variable "operational" is set to false, all state changing transactions except for this one will fail
The lockup of the functions is enabled using the requireOperational() modifier on all the functions
Only owner can call this function for security
nodes.name: setOperatingStatus

nodes.documentation:
RG
@dev Add the contract address to mapping authorizedCotnracts to track authorized callers of this data contract
The contract owner will add the FlightSuretyApp contract address as an approved address. 
This will give the app contract access to the functions of this data contract
nodes.name: authorizeContract

nodes.documentation: * @dev delete the contract address from mapping authorizedContracts to deauthorized callers of this data contract
nodes.name: deAuthorizeContract

nodes.documentation:
@dev Register a new airline and store the airline information to the blockchain in the mapping "airlines"
     Can only be called from FlightSuretyApp contract using the require modifier
nodes.name: registerAirline

nodes.documentation: @dev Function to check to if the given flight was registered by the airline
nodes.name: isFlightRegistered

nodes.documentation: @dev Function to check to if the passenger already bought insurance for this flight
nodes.name: isPassengerInsured

nodes.documentation:
@dev Function to let passenger buy insurance and store the money into this contract and also store data
  of the passenger into a data structure
nodes.name: buyFlightInsurance

nodes.documentation: @dev Function to obtain the insurance premium passengers[0] paid and is stored on the blockchain
nodes.name: getPassengerPayment

nodes.documentation: @dev Function to obtain all the passengerKeys stored on blockchain
nodes.name: getPassengerKeys

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Insurance Contract on Blockchain is out of funds - Cannot pay obligations"

initialValue.value: Insurance Contract on Blockchain is out of funds - Cannot pay obligations

nodes.documentation: @dev Function to credit insurance payments to all eligible passengers whose flights got delayed
